messages.message: ApiName or Action was missiong. List of permissions for this token is returned.

payload.name: User
payload.description: Standard API to fetch User data. The provided parameters will be used to create a select statement with a WHERE ... AND clause. To retrieve everything leaf all the parameters empty. The standard return format is JSON if the parameter APIFORMAT is not specified.

params.name: USERNAME
params.description: The username of the user account.

params.name: STATUS
params.description: Active users can login, inactive users are prohibited to login.

params.name: APIFORMAT
params.description: The return format of the api call.

returnValues.name: USERNAME
returnValues.description: The username of the user account.

returnValues.name: STATUS
returnValues.description: Active users can login, inactive users are prohibited to login.

returnValues.name: DATE_CREATED
returnValues.description: The date and time the user account was created.

returnValues.name: LAST_LOGIN
returnValues.description: The date and time the user has last logged in.

returnValues.name: IS_DELETABLE
returnValues.description: Flag to define if the user can be deleted or not.

returnValues.name: IS_RENAMABLE
returnValues.description: Flag to define if the user can be renamed or not.

returnValues.name: IS_FOREIGN
returnValues.description: Foreign users are managed by other authentication providers like LDAP. Password in database is ignored when a foreign authentication provider is used.

payload.name: Role
payload.description: Standard API to fetch Role data. The provided parameters will be used to create a select statement with a WHERE ... AND clause. To retrieve everything leaf all the parameters empty. The standard return format is JSON if the parameter APIFORMAT is not specified.

params.name: CATEGORY
params.description: The catogery of the role, either 'user' or 'space'.

params.name: APIFORMAT
params.description: The return format of the api call.

returnValues.name: CATEGORY
returnValues.description: The catogery of the role, either 'user' or 'space'.

returnValues.name: IS_DELETABLE
returnValues.description: Flag to define if the role can be deleted or not.

returnValues.name: IS_RENAMABLE
returnValues.description: Flag to define if the role can be renamed or not.
